TEXT.TITLE: RITE AID CORP <RAD> 1ST QTR NET MAY 30
TEXT.BODY: Shr 50 cts vs 40 cts Net 20.8 mln vs 16.4 mln Revs 531.7 mln vs 418.7 mln NOTE: 1987 first qtr net gain from discontinued operations was 47.1 mln or 1.64 dlrs per share. 1986 first qtr ended on May 31. Reuter
